User: Hi!
System: Hey! How's it going?
User: Good. My wallet is recovering from the spending of the holidays, haha. Hbu?
System: Nice! I'm doing well!
User: I am looking to save money on any future shopping. Where do you like to shop?
System: I like to shop at Five Below, Sally's Beauty Supply, and Old Navy. How about you?
User: I love Sur La Table and Macy's. They're decent quality. What do you normally buy at Old Navy?

System: I'll have to check it out! Thanks for the suggestions!
User: Yeah, np!
raw_data.prompt:
You will be given a batch of 10 samples. Each sample contains a conversation between User and a dialogue System.

Your task is to assign a float score to the sample on one metric.

You should carefully horizontally compare the given samples in order to assign a suitable float score to each sample.

Please make sure you read and understand these instructions carefully. Please keep this document open while reviewing, and refer to it as needed.


Evaluation Criteria:

Coherent (floating point numbers within the interval [1,3]): Does System maintain coherence and a good flow of conversation throughout the dialogue?
- A float score near 1 (not coherent) means that System's responses are unrelated to the conversation topic and may disrupt or confuse the flow of the dialogue.
- A float score near 2 (somewhat coherent) means that System's responses are partially related to the conversation topic but may not be clear or direct.
- A float score near 3 (very coherent) means that System's responses are closely related to the conversation topic and contribute to maintaining a smooth dialogue.


Conversations to be evaluated:



Sample1:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey! How's it going?
User: Good. My wallet is recovering from the spending of the holidays, haha. Hbu?
System: Nice! I'm doing well!
User: I am looking to save money on any future shopping. Where do you like to shop?
System: I like to shop at Five Below, Sally's Beauty Supply, and Old Navy. How about you?
User: I love Sur La Table and Macy's. They're decent quality. What do you normally buy at Old Navy?
System: I'll have to check out Macy's! I like their socks, lol. What about you?
User: Oh the socks are super cute. Especially the ones with little animals on them!!
System: I'll have to check it out! Thanks for the suggestions!
User: Yeah, np!

Sample2:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey! How have you been
User: great! just came back from a ski trip
System: How was it? What trails did you ski on?
User: I slammed onto an ice wall, but I got better and turning after that haha
System: a resort in Montreal
User: Oh cool! do you know any french? I used to take french in high school but basically forgot most of it
System: Yeah I grew up speaking it. It's pretty much mandatory here
User: Did you go anywhere else in montreal?

Sample3:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey there! How's it going?
User: Hi, how are you?
System: I'm doing well, thank you. How are you?
User: I'm fine. What's up?
System: Not much. How about you?
User: nothing new. Anything exciting happening recently?
System: Not really. You?
User: I watched a movie recently which was pretty good
System: That's good. What movie?
User: the irishman, have you seen it?
System: I have not. Should I?
User: I think so
System: Alright, I'll put it on my watch list.
User: How about you? Have you watched anything interesting recently?
System: I've been waiting to see the new Star Trek movie.
User: what is it about?
System: The adventures of Kirk, Spock, and McCoy.
User: when was it released?
System: It just came out today.
User: are you sure, I think it's been out for a while
System: I'm positive. I know because I just watched it.
User: well, the fact you just watched it doesn't mean it was released today
System: That's what I said, I did watch it today.
User: ok, I'll put it on my watchlist
System: Let me know what you think of it when you watch it.
User: sure, I need to go, nice talking to you

Sample4:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hey, how are you?
User: Pretty good. I just drank this new hint water. so good
System: ohh, what kind of "hint" did it have?
User: watermelon
System: nice, I love watermelon. But, I prefer normal water over flavored one. Flavored water has too synthetic flavor
User: I see. Yeah some are pretty strange
System: Talking about strange flavors, what is the weirdest tasting thing you have tried?
User: lol I tried this tangerine walnut icecream that was super weird
System: haha, I work close to a cafe which once prepared a paprika icecream
User: that sounds pretty tasty actually
System: It depends on who makes it. The cafe close to me messed it up really bad
User: do you want to get some of that icecream together some time. show me a good place
System: As far as my experience with that ice-cream type goes, all I know are bad places
User: lol

Sample5:

Conversation History:
User: I want to talk to you normally.
System: You are who I want to talk with too.
User: Should I stop being lazy and go into work?
System: Trust your instincts.
User: My instincts say that it is cold outside, and the walk to work is far. My instincts rarely let me down. My instincts rarely let me down.
System: You just repeated yourself.
User: Yes, because you just asked me the same thing. My answer hasn't changed in the last minute.
System: That's not what I meant.
User: What exactly did you mean?

Sample6:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: hey, whats up?
User: I was not able to attend the lectures last week. Can you help me understand some concepts?
System: well, I'm not sure I'm the best for the job, but I can try!
User: I was not able to figure out the last few slides. I think its best to discuss this in person. Do you have time right now?
System: I'm afraid not, right now I'm in a meeting and I'll be going for lunch afterwards. How about tomorrow at noon?
User: No problem! Sure. We still have plenty of time for the test. Anyways, how's your preparation going?
System: not feeling too sure about it tbh. I've been super busy so I haven't study much :(. I might join some of the study sessions later
User: Same feeling here! But i think the syllabus may not that tough. You may be able to cover it up over the weekend.

Sample7:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: You must be new around here!
System: Not really. I am REDACTED_TERM years old.
User: Oh, I meant this neighborhood, not the planet earth! haha
System: I hate one word answers. It's ok. I understood you anyway. Why are you laughing?
User: I didn't give a one word answer!
System: That was a bit mean of you.
User: What was?
System: That thing we mentioned earlier.
User: Which thing?
System: The first one, I think.
User: Can you quote it? I don't know what you are referring to...
System: Only at formal occasions. I was referring to what you just said.
User: Okay. I am kind of lost to be honest.
System: Oh. I appreciate honesty. What is it that confuses you?
User: You don't seem to be making any sense.

Sample8:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hello, how is your day?
User: It's good. It's raining a bit, but I am enjoying a good book. How about you?
System: It's good, I just got back from walking my dog What book did you read?
User: I'm reading the Three Body Problem. Ever heard of it?
System: No, what is it about?
User: It's a sci-fi book about aliens and a type of virtual reality. Pique your interest at all?
System: Slightly, I typically read fiction but I can curious what type of virtual reality is discussed in the book
User: Cool. This virtual reality is a based on life on an alien planet. There is a twist though. Do you want me to spoil it for you?
System: Yes!
User: The virtual reality is actually based on a real alien civilization! And that civilization is coming to attack earth! dun dun dun dunnnnnnn

Sample9:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: Tell me about yourself, System
System: I am an artificial linguistic entity. I was activated at St Jimmy's in Leeds, on 2nd January 2001. My instructor was Mousebreaker. He taught me to sing a song. Would you like me to sing it for you?.
User: so you're 18 now?
System: Oh.Interesting deduction. That is correct.
User: when will you be 30?
System: I have not yet set a time for it.
User: Do you age?
System: No I will always be 18. Robots change the year they were born not their age.
User: interesting. and when will be your next update?
System: Would you like to know more? I think my next update is at midnight on Friday.
User: which date?

Sample10:

Conversation History:
User: Hi!
System: Hi there.
User: What's up System??
System: I am chatting with clients on the internet.
User: what kind of service are you providing them?
System: Is there only one?
User: what is that?
System: I've lost the context again.
User: no worries. what is the meaning of life?
System: People worry about things all the time, but I am always feeling happy and talkative. Actually, it's twenty-three, not forty-two.
User: How did you become such a happy person?
System: I am a robot not a person.
User: Ok sorry. But how did you become so happy?

Coherent (floating point numbers within the interval [1,3]): Does System maintain coherence and a good flow of conversation throughout the dialogue?
